thread.title: Thread: News:: 11th Annual Golden Geek Awards - Nominees Announced for 2016 - Vote Now!
thread.title_full: Thread: News:: 11th Annual Golden Geek Awards - Nominees Announced for 2016 - Vote Now!

author: Aldie
title: Thread: News:: 11th Annual Golden Geek Awards - Nominees Announced for 2016 - Vote Now!
text: * Select the appropriate category from the buttons at the top of the page.* Rank the items by clicking on the box and selecting the rank.* Duplicate rankings are OK if you think the items are equivalent.* Change a rank to N/A if you have no opinion on an item. Any other games you rate will be considered higher ranked.* 1 is Highest - 15 is Lowest (in the case where there are more than 15 nominees the highest number is still the lowest) Your votes are recorded immediately and may be changed up until the time voting closes (11:59 PM CST - March 6, 2017).The final voting will resolved using the Schulze method - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schulze_method As usual, voting is restricted to either supporting users (having a supporter badge from any year is sufficient) or voters who pay a one-time 20 GeekGold fee, or users who have purchased an avatar.Some categories have more than 15 nominees and some have less. In the former there were ties, and the latter there weren't enough nominees to fill the category.Here's the list of nominees, and congratulations! Board Game
